events.message: The insured reported a car accident that occurred at the intersection with moderate damage to the vehicle and requested claim initiation.
After reviewing the initial details, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to damage sustained in a vehicle collision.
An agent with experience in auto claims was assigned promptly to assist the claimant and provide further instructions.
Confirmation sent to the customer acknowledging receipt of the claim and outlining next steps for the investigation process.
Request made for police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and driver’s license to proceed with claim assessment.
Customer submitted all requested documents including accident photos, police report, and insurance proof on time.
Claim investigator initiated the process of verifying details of the collision and assessing the vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident circumstances and validating the claim for further processing.
Based on the investigation results, a settlement offer was proposed covering repair costs and rental car expenses.
The claimant provided positive feedback appreciating the timely updates and fairness of the proposed settlement.
Final approval was granted by the claims manager following acceptance of the settlement terms by the customer.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was processed and disbursed to the claimant’s account.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation of payment receipt and customer satisfaction.
All claim documentation and communications were archived in compliance with company record-keeping policies.
